task:
Infer PT subtypes from gene expression (marker-based) and assign each cell exactly one label from:
PTS1, S1 segment of proximal tubule; PTS2, S2 segment of proximal tubule; PTS3, S3 segment of proximal tubule; Inj-PT, injured proximal tubule; FR-PT, failed repair proximal tubule.

Report the subtype distribution as percentages of total PT cells; percentages should sum to ~100%. Use the exact vocabulary strings.

Return EXACTLY:
<EVAL_ANSWER>
{
  "total_cells": <integer>,
  "cell_type_distribution": {
    "PTS1": <percentage>,
    "PTS2": <percentage>,
    "PTS3": <percentage>,
    "Inj_PT": <percentage>,
    "FR_PT": <percentage>
  }
}
</EVAL_ANSWER>

cell_type_percentages.description: Each subtype % must be within ±5 of ground truth.
